name: Lea
description: Dedicated native German teacher certified by the Goethe Institut specialized in tailor-made learning
about: I am originally from a small village in Austria and have always been fascinated by languages and cultures. I came across my calling as a teacher by coincidence when I was volunteering to teach German to refugees in 2017. Since then, I have gained extensive experience as a German teacher at language schools and in private lessons.

name: Maria
description: Certified Spanish teacher from Spain offering interactive and fun lessons
about: As a native Spanish speaker, I am enthusiastic about sharing my language and culture. I use interactive activities and games to make learning Spanish enjoyable and effective.

name: Sophie
description: French teacher with a focus on conversational skills and French cuisine
about: I believe that learning French should be an immersive experience. I emphasize conversational skills and introduce students to the delights of French cuisine and culture.

name: Luis
description: Experienced Spanish teacher with a focus on grammar and communication
about: With several years of teaching experience, I prioritize teaching Spanish grammar and helping students communicate effectively in everyday situations.

name: Hannah
description: Experienced French teacher with a passion for French literature
about: I am passionate about French literature and culture, and I incorporate literary works into my lessons to deepen language understanding and appreciation.

name: Max
description: Experienced German teacher focused on exam preparation
about: I specialize in preparing students for German language exams, offering comprehensive lessons that cover all aspects of the exam and boost confidence.

name: Isabella
description: Spanish teacher with a focus on Latin American Spanish and culture
about: As a native speaker from Argentina, I teach Latin American Spanish and provide insights into the region's diverse cultures and traditions.

name: Luc
description: Experienced French teacher with a focus on business language
about: Having worked in the business sector, I offer French lessons tailored for professionals, covering business vocabulary, etiquette, and communication.

name: Hannah
description: German teacher with a focus on conversation and cultural immersion
about: I believe in learning German through conversation and cultural immersion. My lessons include discussions on various topics to improve speaking skills.

name: Carlos
description: Experienced Spanish teacher with a focus on Hispanic literature
about: I have a background in Hispanic literature and love sharing literary gems with my students to deepen their understanding of Spanish language and culture.

name: Amelie
description: French teacher with a focus on pronunciation and phonetics
about: I place a strong emphasis on correct pronunciation and phonetics in French, which helps students develop a natural and authentic accent.

name: Paul
description: Experienced German teacher offering lessons for beginners and intermediate learners
about: I have been teaching German to students of all levels for more than 7 years. My approach involves interactive exercises and real-life scenarios.

name: Elena
description: Spanish teacher with a focus on immersive language learning
about: I believe in immersive language learning, and my lessons include cultural activities and conversations to enhance language proficiency.

name: Francois
description: Experienced French teacher with a passion for teaching all ages
about: I have been teaching French to students of all ages, from children to adults. My lessons are engaging, interactive, and tailored to individual needs.

name: Anna
description: Experienced German teacher offering lessons for advanced learners
about: For advanced learners, I focus on complex grammar structures, advanced vocabulary, and discussions on various topics to further language proficiency.

name: Antonio
description: Spanish teacher with a focus on conversational fluency
about: I aim to develop conversational fluency in Spanish through interactive and enjoyable lessons that encourage students to speak from day one.

name: Camille
description: Experienced French teacher with a focus on DELF/DALF exam preparation
about: I specialize in preparing students for the DELF/DALF exams, providing comprehensive lessons that cover all aspects of the exam.

name: Julia
description: German teacher with a focus on grammar and writing skills
about: I emphasize German grammar and writing skills in my lessons, as I believe they form the foundation for effective communication.

name: Isabel
description: Experienced Spanish teacher with a focus on Latin American culture
about: With a passion for Latin American culture, I incorporate cultural insights into my lessons to enhance language learning and understanding.

name: Thierry
description: French teacher with a focus on business language and communication
about: With a background in international business, I offer French lessons that cater to professionals, covering business vocabulary and communication skills.
